title: The Lost Frankenstein Pages
description: In 1983, Marvel Comics published a landmark edition of Frankenstein - exquisitely illustrated by Bernie Wrightson. But (for reasons revealed inside) many of the illustrations Bernie drew for the project were left out.Now these rare, unpublished pieces, breathtaking in design and rich in detail, are gathered together at last - in this special, high-quality collector's edition.
author: Bernie Wrightson
